conditions.name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
conditions.suggestion: Important: Avoid lying down after meals. Common tablets: Proton pump inhibitors like Omeprazole (20-40mg) or Esomeprazole (20-40mg), H2 blockers like Famotidine (20-40mg), Antacids like Calcium carbonate (500-1000mg) for quick relief. Elevate head while sleeping, eat smaller meals.

conditions.name: Peptic Ulcer
conditions.suggestion: Important: Complete full course of medication. Common tablets: Proton pump inhibitors like Pantoprazole (40mg), Antibiotics if H. pylori present: Amoxicillin (1000mg) + Clarithromycin (500mg), Bismuth subsalicylate (525mg) for protection. Avoid NSAIDs, quit smoking, limit alcohol.

conditions.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
conditions.suggestion: Important: Keep food diary. Common tablets: Antispasmodics like Dicyclomine (20mg), Loperamide (2mg) for diarrhea, Lubiprostone (8mcg) for constipation, Simethicone (80mg) for gas. Probiotics recommended. Identify trigger foods, manage stress, regular exercise essential.
